doc.title: The Grandest Story Ever Told!: Record your Grandmother story for posterity!
doc.text: My/PRP$ grandma/NN used/VBD to/TO say/VB that/IN the/DT way/NN to/TO pick/VB up/IN girls/NN was/VBD to/TO accidentally/VB bump/VB them/PRP onto/IN the/DT ground/NN and/CC then/RB help/VB them/PRP up/VB !/. She/PRP also/RB used/VBD to/TO say/VB that/IN the/DT way/NN to/TO see/VB if/IN a/DT person/NN is/VBZ the/DT real/JJ owner/NN of/IN a/DT certain/JJ item/NN is/VBZ to/TO see/VB if/IN it/PRP sticks/VBZ to/TO their/PRP$ noses/NNS !/. I/PRP guess/VB that/WDT was/VBD her/PRP way/NN of/IN tell/VB me/PRP that/IN nothing/NN belonged/NN to/TO me/PRP !/. Do/VBP you/PRP have/VB a/DT photo/NN with/IN a/DT grandmother/JJ story/NN to/TO tell/VB ?/. I/PRP am/VBP sure/JJ you/PRP do/VBP !/. Better/PRP still/RB ,/, if/IN grandma/NN or/CC grandpa/NNS are/VBP still/RB around/RB ,/, bring/RB them/PRP down/VB to/TO Chye/NNP Seng/NNP Huat/NNP Hardware/NNP Coffee/NNP House/NN for/IN a/DT free/JJ cup/NN of/IN coffee/NN on/IN 10/CD Nov/NN 2012/NN !/. We/PRP want/VB to/TO hear/NN ,/, record/NN and/CC perhaps/VBD even/RB video/JJ tape/IN their/PRP$ stories/NN for/IN the/DT Singapore/NNP Memory/NNP Project/NNP !/. There/EX 's/POS going/NN to/TO be/VB lots/RB of/IN giveaways/NN and/CC if/IN your/PRP$ grandma/NN has/VBZ some/JJ food/NN memories/NN of/IN Bak/NNP Kut/NNP Teh/NNP or/CC Hock/NNP Lam/NNP Street/NNP ,/, I/PRP want/VB to/TO chat/VB with/IN her/PRP !/. So/RB ,/, you/PRP planning/VBG to/TO come/VB ?/. Register/DT here/RB ./. See/VB you/PRP there/RB !/.
